name: New feelwords English
description:
New feelwords – a new look at intellectual puzzle game Feelwords.

The Foundation of the creation is the Hungarian crossword.
The essence of the fields is to find words from letters hidden on the playing field.
Select the letters with your finger and find all the words to complete the level.

* Choose theme of the feelwords
* Solve word puzzles
* Find and learn words by highlighting them in the game
* Develop your mind and vocabulary
* Visually pleasing simple graphics
* Choose the design
* Words from simple to complex
• Great exercise for the brain
• For phones and tablets

A simple puzzle at the start turns into a complex and fascinating journey through the world of words. Make words on a variety of playing fields. If difficult, then the hint is always there.

Several hundred levels, divided into many topics will not be bored and will test your intellectual abilities.

The game New Feelwords offers to choose your style of interface design, but also offers freedom of choice theme feelwords.

Download game New game feelwords, select the theme of feelwords, find words.

Will you be able to find all the hidden words and go through the game to the end?
